headline: Scotch-Brite launches "The Brite Side of Clean," featuring iconic track "So Fresh, So Clean"
summary: Scotch-Brite™, America's #1 selling scrub sponge brand, announced today the launch of its vibrant new brand campaign, "The Brite Side of Clean," ushering in a fresh era of cleaning focused on joy, self-expression and the satisfaction of a job well done—made easy with the right tools.

raw.headline: Scotch-Brite launches "The Brite Side of Clean," featuring iconic track "So Fresh, So Clean"

headline: Every 3M Investor Should Keep an Eye on These 3 Numbers
summary: 3M (NYSE: MMM) stock has had a wild ride.  After years of litigation surrounding its multi-decade production of PFAS -- deemed "forever" chemicals that wreak havoc on the health of both exposed humans and ecosystems -- shares finally found a bottom last year.  Over the past 12 months, 3M's share price has spiked by more than 50%.
